outputs.name: dir_ill
outputs.description:
A data collection of direct normal illuminance values at each
timestep of the WEA.

outputs.name: diff_ill
outputs.description:
A list of diffuse sky solar illuminance values at each
timestep of the WEA.

outputs.name: glob_ill
outputs.description:
A list of global horizontal illuminance values at each
timestep of the WEA.

inputs.name: _dew_point
inputs.description: An annual data collection representing dew point temperature [C].

name: DF Luminous Efficacy
description:
Esimtate sky illuminance from the irradiance contained within a WEA object.
